title: Titanstring Bow

BG3 Titanstring Bow Location & Where to Find

Location: Quest: Crafting: Merchant: Brem in the Zhentarim Hideout at Waukeen's Rest after completing Find the Missing Shipment. Lann Tarv in Moonrise Towers. Dropped by:
